statements: SELECT * FROM signature_data
SELECT signature_name, signature_description FROM signature_data WHERE signature_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT signature_id, signature_date, signature_description FROM signature_data ORDER BY signature_date DESC
SELECT signature_id, signature_name FROM signature_data WHERE signature_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT signature_name AS name, signature_description AS description FROM signature_data
SELECT * FROM signature_data ORDER BY signature_name DESC, signature_date ASC
SELECT signature_id, signature_name FROM signature_data WHERE signature_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE signature_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE signature_name IN ('signature1', 'signature2', 'signature3')
SELECT MAX(signature_id) AS max_id, MIN(signature_id) AS min_id FROM signature_data
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT signature_text, signature_date FROM signatures;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_text, signature_id FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM reports WHERE signature_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE signature_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT signature_id, signature_text FROM signatures WHERE signature_id < 100 ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT s.signature_text, r.report_text FROM signatures s INNER JOIN reports r ON s.signature_id = r.signature_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS signature_count FROM signatures;
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT signature_data, signature_date FROM signatures ORDER BY signature_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_id, investigation_id, report_date FROM reports WHERE investigation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE signature_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name FROM investigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_id, report_data FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM reports GROUP BY investigation_id;
SELECT * FROM signatures INNER JOIN investigations ON signatures.id = investigations.case_id WHERE investigations.investigator_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM signature_data ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT signature, data_source FROM signature_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY data_source ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT analyst_name FROM forensics_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY analyst_name;
SELECT signature_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM trends_analysis GROUP BY signature_id HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_trends WHERE trend_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND trend_end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY trend_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM signature_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT signature, data_source FROM signature_data WHERE signature LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT * FROM trends_analysis WHERE trend_score > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, COUNT(analysis_id) AS num_analyses FROM trends_analysis GROUP BY report_id HAVING num_analyses > 2;
SELECT trend_description, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM signature_trends ORDER BY trend_start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM signatures;
SELECT signature_text, signature_date FROM signatures WHERE signature_id = 1;
SELECT signer_name FROM signers ORDER BY signer_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM analysis_reports WHERE signature_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC, signature_date ASC;
SELECT signer_name, signing_date FROM signers WHERE signer_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_latitude < 0;
SELECT s.signer_name, r.analysis_date, l.location_name FROM signers s JOIN analysis_reports r ON s.signer_id = r.signer_id JOIN locations l ON r.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT log_id, investigator_name, investigation_notes FROM investigation_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
